original_title: 62 arrested in connection with Kandakadu conflict
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Police said that sixty-two inmates have been arrested in connection with the conflict at the Kandankadu Rehabilitation Center.
24 inmates have been admitted to the Welikanda Hospital for treatment due to the clash that occurred on Friday (12) evening.
Commissioner General of Rehabilitation, retired Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi said that 28 inmates escaped during the conflict.
